CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Daily_Points_Scored__c != 0, Total_Daily_Points__c != 0, NOT(ISNULL(Daily_Alcoholic_Drinks_Drank__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Daily_Liters_of_Water_Drank__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Screen_Time__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Sleep_Time__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Daily_Steps__c)), NOT(ISNULL(Daily_Pushups__c)) ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Completed Day
